experiences.label: Delving into Trading as a Summer Scout
experiences.name: Camp Whitsett
experiences.description: Facilitated trading post operations in all forms (cashier, custodian, and financial)

experiences.label: A Sojourn in the Last Frontier
experiences.name: Intern to the Lieutenant Governor of Alaska
experiences.description: Began summer internship in Washington DC, helping to draft legislative guidelines to aid in unmanned aerial vehicle (drone) policy generation as a joint endeavor between a local law firm and the ACLU. After a week of far too much reading of parched drone documents, I flew to Anchorage to carry out the remaining three weeks of my internship, where I partnered with Alaska Magazine to create content and help with image organization, visited wildlife preserves, flew in a floatplane to swim next to an iceberg, and much much more!

experiences.label: Entreprenurial Pursuits in Quad Copters
experiences.name: Bot Systems
experiences.description: Learned some benefits of failure by bootstrapping a hardware startup from prototype creation through investor pitches. After 20+ iterations along the way, created the first cellular operable drone complete with augmented reality and a 360Â° capture system.

experiences.label: Barre Business Ballads
experiences.name: The Bar Method
experiences.description: Maximized future equity and fairness among franchisees by developing a franchise territory designation model. To aid this goal, I developed and extracted useful data for modeling by digitizing all currently existing franchise territories (90+).
